metadata.title: CVE-2021-40694 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient escaping of the LaTeX preamble made it possible for siteadministrators to read files available to the HTTP server system account.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
